message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it!
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I believe I can offer a fair price of $95 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I think it's a great product and I'm confident you'll love it!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it, but I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product.
I'm glad you're interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $105. I think it's a fair price for such a great product!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your position, but I would like to stick to my previous proposal of $100 for the product.
I'm starting to think we're close, Bob. I can do $108, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. It's a great product and I think it's worth more than that, but I'm willing to compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $105 for the product.
I think we're getting close, Bob. I can do $109, but that's my final offer. I really need to get a good price for this product.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I am willing to pay $107 for it.
